channel.title: Merry Christmas Everyone!
channel.description:
Merry Christmas Moparisthebest.com. I hope you all have a great Christmas (well, there is the case of Brent) But who, what a year on Mopar aye?
There's been moments, e.g. SilabSofts, Franks, Bigmacs and Kryptons Key logger... Xerocheez's Firefox pass word stealer The Moderation of Mod Taharok
And many other moments that don't come straight to mind, oh, by the way, if you don't celebrate Christmas, don't bother flaming me, because you know what? It's funny watching you ass's that flame other people make total and udder retards.
Merry Christmas!
- All for 64 :P

item.title: Merry Christmas Everyone!
